items.title: Elon Musk reportedly fires Tesla’s top sales exec
items.description: Omead Afshar, one of Musk's top lieutenants, is out after more than seven years at the company. He was recently elevated to a VP role in late 2024.

items.title: Threads now lets you manage Hidden Words separately from Instagram, set time limits
items.description: Threads, Meta’s competitor to X, now has its own Hidden Words settings that operates separately from Instagram.

items.title: The Trump Phone Is Already a Lot Different From Last Week
items.description: WIRED had many questions last week about the Gold T1 Smartphone. Now we have even more—like where that “made in America” pledge went.

items.title: Rivian cuts dozens on manufacturing team ahead of R2 launch
items.description: The company laid off around 1% of its total workforce, or around 140 employees. It's the third round of cuts since the start of 2024.
